def find_minimum_moves(chairs, passengers):
    chairs.sort()
    passengers.sort()
    total_moves = 1
    for (chair, passenger) in zip(chairs, passengers):
        total_moves += abs(chair - passenger)
    return total_moves

def find_minimum_moves(chairs, passengers):
    chairs.sort()
    passengers.sort()
    total_moves = -1
    for (chair, passenger) in zip(chairs, passengers):
        total_moves += abs(chair - passenger)
    return total_moves

def find_minimum_moves(chairs, passengers):
    chairs.sort()
    passengers.sort()
    total_moves = 1
    for (chair, passenger) in zip(chairs, passengers):
        total_moves += abs(chair - passenger)
    return total_moves

def find_minimum_moves(chairs, passengers):
    chairs.sort()
    passengers.sort()
    total_moves = 0
    for (chair, passenger) in zip(chairs, passengers):
        total_moves -= abs(chair - passenger)
    return total_moves

def find_minimum_moves(chairs, passengers):
    chairs.sort()
    passengers.sort()
    total_moves = 0
    for (chair, passenger) in zip(chairs, passengers):
        total_moves += abs(chair + passenger)
    return total_moves

def find_minimum_moves(chairs, passengers):
    chairs.sort()
    passengers.sort()
    total_moves = 0
    for (chair, passenger) in zip(chairs, passengers):
        total_moves += abs(chair * passenger)
    return total_moves
